section.title: Course Description
section.p: Taken from the official PCC course description:

Covers elementary linear algebra with a focus on n-space and applications. Includes linear systems, vectors in n-space, vector space properties of n-space, and matrix algebra, including eigenspaces. Required: Matrix-capable calculator. Recommended: TI-89 Titanium or Casio Classpad 330. Prerequisite: MTH 252. Audit available.
The complete Course Content and Outcome Guide can be found at www.pcc.edu/ccog/.
